margs:
["SELECT 
concat('[', `tracking`.`todo`.`todo` , ',', '"', concat(`tracking`.`todo`.`description` , '/', `tracking`.`todo`.`id` ), '"', ']') as `todo`,`tracking`.`todo`.`start_date`  as `start_date`,`tracking`.`todo`.`review_date`  as `review_date`,`tracking`.`todo`.`end_date`  as `end_date`,`tracking`.`todo`.`developer`  as `developer`,concat('[', `tracking`.`todo`.`minute` , ',', '"', `minute_selector`.`id`, '"', ']') as `minute`,`tracking`.`todo`.`description`  as `description`,`tracking`.`todo`.`id`  as `id`,`tracking`.`todo`.`is_done`  as `is_done` 
FROM 
`tracking`.`todo`
left join 	 (SELECT 
`tracking`.`minute`.`minute`  as `minute_selector`,concat(`tracking`.`meeting`.`date` , '/', `tracking`.`meeting`.`venue` ) as `id` 
FROM 
`tracking`.`minute`
inner join 	 `tracking`.`meeting` ON  `tracking`.`minute`.`meeting`  = `tracking`.`meeting`.`meeting`
inner join 	 `tracking`.`organization` ON  `tracking`.`meeting`.`organization`  = `tracking`.`organization`.`organization`
) as `minute_selector`  ON  `todo`.`minute` = `minute_selector`.`minute_selector`
 ORDER BY  `todo`.`todo`  Asc LIMIT 20 OFFSET 0"]
